title: Koukaku Kidoutai: Shin Movie Virtual Reality Diver
synopsis: Animation studio Production I.G announced on Monday that it will enter the virtual reality (VR) content market with an app titled Koukaku Kidoutai Shin Gekijou-ban Virtual Reality Diver (Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie Virtual Reality Diver).
related_anime: ['Koukaku Kidoutai: Shin Movie', 'Koukaku Kidoutai: Ghost Chaser']
